channel.title: ClickToFlash Appcast
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates

item.title: version 1.5
item.description:
• 1.5 Fixed text encoding issues when importing from NetNewsWire.
  • Trim whitespace and remove newlines in episode titles.
  • Updating and revealing podcasts after sync works better when there are multiple podcasts.
  • Ensure podcasts are subscribed before trying to reveal in iTunes.
